WorkItem.Description:
I would really appreciate an upgrade to the "Direct Upgrades" Feature.
 
1. Seperation by Dungeonmode on the X-Axis, 25, 25Hard, 10, 10 Hard
2. Seperation by Dungeon on the Y-Axis
3. Printable
4. Removal of the Bars since that would waste too much space, just leave the DPS number
 
Since I do this manually now, to know what I should spend my DKP on :-)
Maybe later on I'll post a screenshot of the Excel File I print every other week or so.
I hope I'm not the only one that would like this feature.

Comments.Message:
Ok I created a quick mock up of the list I update manually and print every 2 weeks or so.
Would be really awesome If you create this, I'll make another donation if you do :)
Err... I really hope you're not using the Direct Upgrades chart to build that. You should be using Build Upgrade list for this need, and it already supports filtering by what you describe.

Neat, I didn't know that feature.
Especially Export to Lootplan sounds interesting, I'll have to check that out, that might be what I need.

Filtering is great, but I want all my needs on one paper.
(or addon, I need to test lootplan for sure)
Na... I like my list better than lootplan.

Reason?

What do I need to program for rawr?
